title: Go Tell It On the Mountain shift

content.question: Toward the end of the final paragraph, the narrator’s description of how “the room shifted” most clearly serves to convey how

choices.label: John is beginning to feel ill and dizzy after sleeping so long
John sees the room as more pleasant with the arrival of the morning sun
John’s overpowering emotions evoke a different perspective on his mother
John’s mother’s words serve to break him out of a kind of trance

content.answer: John’s overpowering emotions evoke a different perspective on his mother

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
